name: ConceptMapMobilityToSNOMED
title: Mobility Assessments to SNOMED CT Mapping
description: Operational ConceptMap for mobility assessment terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between consumer mobility monitoring wearables and SNOMED CT standard terminology.
purpose: Provides semantic mappings from custom mobility assessment codes to standard SNOMED CT codes. Consumer wearables (Apple Watch, Garmin) increasingly provide gait analysis and mobility assessments but use proprietary terminology.

target.comment: Gait assessment maps to SNOMED 'Gait, function' observable entity. Code 271706000 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Balance assessment maps to SNOMED 'Balance' observable entity. Code 271722003 should be verified.

Walking steadiness (Apple Watch metric) maps to broader SNOMED 'Balance' concept. Source is specific algorithmic measurement from accelerometer/gyroscope during walking, target is general balance concept. No exact SNOMED match for 'walking steadiness' consumer metric.
Walking speed maps directly to SNOMED 'Walking speed' observable entity. Code 249869000 should be verified.
Movement assessment maps to SNOMED 'Movement quality' observable entity. Code 364555000 should be verified.
